required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Video Consultation During Follow up Surgical Care
clinical_study.official_title: Video Consultation During Follow up Care: Effect on Quality of Care and Patient- and Provider Attitude in Patients With Colorectal Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Academisch Medisch Centrum - Universiteit van Amsterdam (AMC-UvA)

clinical_study.source: Academisch Medisch Centrum - Universiteit van Amsterdam (AMC-UvA)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to compare the willingness to use and attitude towards VC amongst both patients with colorectal cancer and healthcare providers during follow up care. Second, to determine the satisfaction with the quality of the healthcare provider and the usability of the used VC technology. 50 patients will be asked to choose between video consultation or face-to-face contact at the outpatient surgical clinic.

primary_outcome.measure: Attitude and satisfaction with video consultation

secondary_outcome.measure: Usability of the video consultation technology
Quality of provided care by surgeon: MSF questionnaire

arm_group.description: Patients who preferred a traditional F2F-appointment were seen at the outpatient clinic.
Patients who preferred a video consult were seen over a video connection.

intervention.description: A two-way audio and visual connection between patients and surgeons

study_pop.textblock: Patients with colorectal cancer scheduled for appointment at the surgical oncology outpatient a tertiary referral center.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18 years or older
- Fluent in speaking and writing in Dutch
- Follow up appointments in which overall progress, new complaints, results with good news and treatment was discussed were considered feasible.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Introductory appointments
- Bad news consultations
- Physical examination needed
- No access to Internet
- No access to a smartphone, tablet or computer with a camera
- Not willing to activate their electronic patient portal

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Academisch Medisch Centrum - Universiteit van Amsterdam (AMC-UvA)
